sentences.en: Because, this may cause the market to realize variously altogether wins.
sentences.cn: 因为, 这可以使得市场实现多方面共赢.

sentences.en: Country and agricultural issue were caused again care and take seriously variously.
sentences.cn: 农村和农业问题又一次引起了各级的关心和重视.

sentences.en: Ethnology has been variously defined in different national traditions.
sentences.cn: 由于不同的民族传统,民族学有着各种不同的定义.

sentences.en: Fans of the radial - flow type include the variously designed centrifugal fans.
sentences.cn: 辐射流类型的风机包括不同的离心风机设计.

sentences.en: He has been variously described as a hero, a genius and a bully.
sentences.cn: 他被描述为英雄、天才、恶霸，不一而足。

sentences.en: He was variously described as a hero, a genius and a fool.
sentences.cn: 把他说成是英雄 、 天才、笨蛋,不一而足.

sentences.en: His fortune has been variously estimated at between $1 and $2 billion.
sentences.cn: 对他的财富有各种猜测，从10亿美元到20亿美元不等。

sentences.en: I am in variously skilful hands.
sentences.cn: 我读过各种各样巧妙的作品.

sentences.en: Objective : Variously discussing the tactics to enhance the employment rate.
sentences.cn: 目的 从多角度探索提高就业率的对策.

sentences.en: The drug is variously known as crack or freebase.
sentences.cn: 这种毒品的叫法五花八门,有人称为crack,也有人叫它freebase.

sentences.en: The family has been described variously as crass, bigoted, racist and plain boring.
sentences.cn: 人们对这家人有各种不同的评价：愚蠢、顽固、有种族偏见和无聊透顶，不一而足。

sentences.en: The figure of the Ancient Mariner has been variously interpreted.
sentences.cn: 对于《古舟子咏》中的人物,一直有着各种各样的理解.

sentences.en: The minerals may have variously experienced reaction , resorption, and perhaps even growth, as they settled.
sentences.cn: 当矿物沉降之后, 它们可能经历了多种反应作用, 溶蚀作用甚至可能还有生长作用.

sentences.en: The specific epithet variously did or did not repeat a key word from the phrase - name.
sentences.cn: 种加词不同程度地重复或不重复同片语名称的某个关键词.

sentences.en: The verb in question is written variously realize and realise.
sentences.cn: 我们正在讲的这个动词可以分别写成realize和realise两种形式.

sentences.en: This material is variously termed ash, clinker, cinders or slag.
sentences.cn: 这种材料有不同的名称,如灰 、 炉渣 、 煤渣或矿渣.

words.tran_cn: 形状不同的；有多种形态的
有诸家注解的；集注的；集不同版本而成之版本的
不同地；多方面地；个别地；多彩地

trans.tran_cn: 不同地，各种各样地，多彩的，多方面地
